name: My Candy Love: Epilogue (Hyun Route)
description:
Hyun is just so boring and bland it's unnatural. That's because he's actually a psychopath.

9 endings in total!
It's a fangame, so nothing belongs to me except for the plot and the game's script.

It's also a big joke and my first attempt at making a visual novel (ar any type of game).
